subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
Fashion and Apparel
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, who has played his entire career with a headband, lost it when it was knocked off in Game 6. The rare sight of his playing without it will not be repeated, James said.
snippet: LeBron James, who has played his entire career with a headband, lost it when it was knocked off in Game 6. The rare sight of his playing without it will not be repeated, James said.
